Question: In a 2010 Space Foundation survey, this person was ranked as the #1 most popular space hero.
Hints: This person was later awarded honorary doctorates by several universities.
On March 22, 1956, this person was in a Boeing B-29 Superfortress, which was to air-drop a Douglas D-558-2 Skyrocket.
Four days later, this person was involved in a second incident, when he flew for the only time with Chuck Yeager.
